snippet: Adding the animals to the list of endangered species would pose a new obstacle to their use in invasive biomedical research.
abstract: United States Fish and Wildlife Service proposes bringing captive chimpanzees under protection of Endangered Species Act; move would create major barrier to conducting invasive medical research on chimpanzees for human diseases; public and privately financed researchers will have to show that experiments contribute to survival of chimps that remain in wild.
lead_paragraph: Adding the animals to the list of endangered species would pose a new obstacle to their use in invasive biomedical research.

headline.seo: U.S. Moves to Declare Captive Chimps Endangered
headline.main: U.S. Proposes Wildlife Protection for Captive Chimps
headline.print_headline: U.S. Proposes Wildlife Protection for Captive Chimps
